frontmatter.title: Think Into the Deep Thought
frontmatter.short: Become a catalyst for change.  Others might be intimidated by new knowledge, fear what they don’t understand.   But we can calm those fears and discover new understanding because we are willing to soak it in. Because we crave discovery.  Think into the deep.
frontmatter.keywords: business intelligence reporting, data driven decision making, data driven decisions, using data to make decisions
